dogecoincom-header-desc: Dogecoin is an open source peer-to-peer digital currency, favored by Shiba Inus worldwide.
dogecoincom-quick-desc: Dogecoin is a decentralized, peer-to-peer digital currency that enables you to easily send money online. Think of it as "the internet currency."
dogecoincom-what-with-dog: What's with the dog on the coin?
dogecoincom-doge-explained: "Doge" is our fun, friendly mascot! The Shiba Inu is a Japanese breed of dog that was popularized as an online meme and it represents Dogecoin.
dogecoincom-fun-currency: The fun and friendly internet currency.
dogecoincom-set-apart: Dogecoin sets itself apart from other digital currencies with an amazing, vibrant community made up of friendly folks just like you.
dogecoincom-foundation-desc: - Non-Profit Organization which uses Dogecoin for goodwill and charitable endeavors.
dogecoincom-getting-started: How to get started with Dogecoin.
dogecoincom-setup-wallet: Setting up a Dogecoin wallet is as easy as 1, 2, 3. Seriously! Check out our Getting Started guide below.
dogecoincom-grow-community: Once you're done, join in on the fun as part of our growing community!
dogecoincom-we-helpful: We're a helpful bunch of people and we'll answer any questions that you throw at us!
dogecoincom-footer-waiting: So what are you waiting for?
dogecoincom-get-dogecoin-how: Find out how to get Dogecoin.
dogecoincom-footer-credits: created by Jackson Palmer Shibetoshi Nakamoto, website design by PowerLemons, logo by Christine Ricks
dogecoincom-browser-modal-online: Online wallets are the quickest and easiest way to use Dogecoin, but lack the security of storing your wallet on your local computer.
dogecoincom-browser-modal-online-warning: We recommend you only store a small amount of Dogecoin in an online wallet at any time.
dogecoincom-browser-modal-online-choice: There are several browser-based wallets available to choose from:
dogecoincom-browser-modal-online-disclai: Note: These online wallets are not owned or maintained by Dogecoin or the Dogecoin Foundation. While we think the entities behind them are trustworthy - please use at your own risk.
dogecoincom-ios-wallet-modal-view-only: MyDoge for iOS can only be used to view wallets.
dogecoincom-ios-wallet-modal-not-send: MyDoge cannot send Dogecoins. You must set up an actual Dogecoin wallet before you can use this Dogecoin Wallet viewer.
dogecoincom-ios-wallet-modal-los-gehts: Click the button to proceed to the Appstore Page.
dogecoincom-learnmore-modal-dogeisfun: Dogecoin is a fun, new and rapidly growing form of digital currency.
dogecoincom-learnmore-modal-crypto: This form of digital currency is called "cryptocurrency"; a type of digital currency.
dogecoincom-learnmore-modal-anonymous: Cryptocurrency is completely anonymous, decentralized, and extremely secure.
dogecoincom-learnmore-modal-wallet: Dogecoin is used with a wallet on your computer, your smartphone, or a website.
dogecoincom-learnmore-modal-uses: You can use it to buy goods and services, or trade it for other currencies (both other cryptocurrencies or traditional currency like US dollars).
dogecoincom-learnmore-modal-tipping: One of the most popular uses for Dogecoin is "tipping" fellow internet-goers who create or share great content.
dogecoincom-learnmore-modal-meaningful: Think of it as a more meaningful "like" or upvote, with real value that can be used all across the internet.
dogecoincom-learnmore-modal-very-easy: It is very easy to start using Dogecoin.
dogecoincom-learnmore-modal-more-info: More information in the guide below.
dogecoincom-community-modal-participate: Participate in our Reddit community, chat on our IRC (Internet Chat) channel, or have fun on our forums.
dogecoincom-community-modal-reddit-desc: - The Main Hotspot of the Dogecoin Community.
dogecoincom-community-modal-friendly: We are friendly, and we will be happy to answer any Dogecoin-related questions.
dogecoincom-community-modal-not-bite: Try us, we promise we won't bite!
dogecoincom-exchanges-modal-many-ways: There are numerous amounts of ways to get Dogecoin. You can buy them, trade for them, get tipped, "mine" them, and more. They are surprisingly endless!
dogecoincom-exchanges-modal-tipped: You can get tipped Dogecoin by participating in our community.
dogecoincom-exchanges-modal-faucet: If that's not your style, the easiest way to have your first Dogecoin is to get them from a faucet.
dogecoincom-exchanges-modal-faucet-faq: A Faucet is a website which gives you a small amount of Dogecoin for free to introduce you to the currency! All you need is your Dogecoin address.
dogecoincom-exchanges-modal-faucet-sites: Here are a couple Dogecoin faucets:
dogecoincom-exchanges-modal-dogefaucet-d: - Enter your address to get free Dogecoin.
dogecoincom-exchanges-modal-dogec0in-des: - Chat with the community to get free Dogecoin.
dogecoincom-exchanges-modal-exchanges: You can also buy them or exchange for them with regular money. This is an easy way to get Dogecoin.
dogecoincom-exchanges-modal-list: Here are some trusted Dogecoin exchanges:
dogecoincom-exchanges-modal-anxpro-desc: (USD, EUR, GBP, AUD, CAD, HKD, SGD, NZD)
dogecoincom-exchanges-modal-mining: You can also get Dogecoin by "mining" it. Mining is when you use your computer to process Dogecoin transactions by other people, and in return you get Dogecoin.
dogecoincom-exchanges-modal-mining-howto: Mining is intended for advanced users only, as it requires a lot of technical knowledge to do. If you are interested, read more here.
dogecoincom-exchanges-modal-disclaimer: Note: These online faucets and exchanges are not owned or maintained by Dogecoin or the Dogecoin Foundation. While we are satisfied they are trustworthy, reliable services - please use at your own risk.
dogecoincom-stores-modal-shop-online: You can shop for goods online with Dogecoin.
dogecoincom-stores-modal-sale: Dogecoin is safe during checkout, because you don't put down any sensitive bank information! Just send your Dogecoin to the address specified by the merchant, and then you'll have your item processed and ready for delivery in an instant!
dogecoincom-stores-modal-businesses: Here are some businesses that accept Dogecoin:
dogecoincom-stores-modal-directories: If that isn't enough, you can look at the Dogecoin Business Directory below.
dogecoincom-stores-modal-disclaimer: Note: These online shops and business directories are not owned or maintained by Dogecoin or the Dogecoin Foundation. While we are satisfied they are trustworthy, reliable services - please use at your own risk.
dogecoincom-windows-wallet-modal-getting: Learn how to set up your wallet with the Getting Started Guide.
dogecoincom-windows-wallet-modal-differe: What are the differences between the two?
dogecoincom-windows-wallet-modal-sync: You have to sync with the blockchain to use Dogecoin.
dogecoincom-windows-wallet-modal-ledger: This means, you need the Dogecoin "ledger" to use Dogecoin.
dogecoincom-windows-wallet-modal-light-w: MultiDoge is a "light" wallet. It syncs with the blockchain by "skimming" through the blockchain, providing fast sync times.
dogecoincom-windows-wallet-modal-full-wa: Dogecoin Core, on the other hand, is a "full" wallet. It syncs by downloading it, providing a solid-working Dogecoin wallet.
dogecoincom-windows-wallet-modal-differe: Both wallets have their advantages and disadvantages.
dogecoincom-windows-wallet-modal-multido: MultiDoge is a light wallet, so it only needs to "skim" through the blockchain before it becomes usable. This is done quickly.
But the wallet should only be for normal use. It cannot be used to mine Dogecoin, as the wallet will become slow and unresponsive if used this way.
dogecoincom-windows-wallet-modal-dogecoi: Dogecoin Core on the other hand, downloads the entire blockchain. Its initial sync is significantly slower compared to MultiDoge, and it takes up a lot more space.
But this comes at an advantage. It is safe to mine Dogecoin with this wallet, as it will be able to handle the transactions from payouts. It will also help maintain the Dogecoin network.
